name: Zigzag Roll Ball 3D
description:
Zigzag Roll Ball is very addictive fun rolling ball style game. The ball is rolling itself and you need to change its directions to stay on the tack. Its one of the best Wall Ball 3D game. The wall is falling and you have to be fast and quick to go forward. The faster you tap on the screen the more chances you have to succeed and cross the zigzag puzzle path but be careful as you might be too fast and make a wrong turn.

how to play?
Stay on the path and do as many zigzags as you can to get to high score. Zig Zag game is fun.

just tap the screen to change the direction of the ball and try not to fall off the wall. Collecting gems will give you extra points. Try not to fall off the edges!. have fun playing Zigzag Tap And Play Roll Ball.
